title: Nobel Laureate Muhammad Yunus To Lead Bangladesh Interim Government
content: Bangladesh's Nobel-winning microfinance pioneer Muhammad Yunus has been tapped to lead an interim government after the ouster of prime minister Sheikh Hasina, the country's presidency announced early Wednesday.
summary: Bangladesh's Nobel-winning microfinance pioneer Muhammad Yunus has been tapped to lead an interim government after the ouster of prime minister Sheikh Hasina, the country's presidency announced early Wednesday.

title: Families Of People Killed In Bangladesh Protests Place 11-Point Demands
content: Families of the persons killed in Bangladesh's student protests on Tuesday placed 11-point demands, including rehabilitation by providing jobs, before the interim government,
summary: Families of the persons killed in Bangladesh's student protests on Tuesday placed 11-point demands, including rehabilitation by providing jobs, before the interim government,

title: Hamas Names New Chief After Ismail Haniyeh's Killing
content: Hamas named Gaza Strip chief Yahya Sinwar as its new political leader on Tuesday, a week after his predecessor Ismail Haniyeh's killing in Tehran which has sent regional tensions soaring.
summary: Hamas named Gaza Strip chief Yahya Sinwar as its new political leader on Tuesday, a week after his predecessor Ismail Haniyeh's killing in Tehran which has sent regional tensions soaring.

title: Chinese Academic Convicted Of Acting As Foreign Agent In US
content: Wang Shujun was a naturalised US citizen.
summary: Wang Shujun was a naturalised US citizen.

title: Israel Army Confirms Death Of Last Missing Person From October 7 Attack
content: The Israeli military confirmed on Tuesday that Bilha Yinon, the last person listed as missing from the October 7 Hamas attack, was killed by militants that day.
summary: The Israeli military confirmed on Tuesday that Bilha Yinon, the last person listed as missing from the October 7 Hamas attack, was killed by militants that day.

title: Discovery Of Tiny Arm Bone Sheds Light On Mysterious ''Hobbit'' Humans
content: The discovery of a tiny arm bone suggests that an ancient human dubbed "hobbits" only shrank down to their diminutive size after they arrived on an Indonesian island a million years ago, scientists said on Tuesday.
summary: The discovery of a tiny arm bone suggests that an ancient human dubbed "hobbits" only shrank down to their diminutive size after they arrived on an Indonesian island a million years ago, scientists said on Tuesday.

title: "Powerful Voice For People": Biden On Kamala Harris' Vice President Pick
content: US President Joe Biden said Tim Walz would be a "powerful voice for working people and America's great middle class."
summary: US President Joe Biden said Tim Walz would be a "powerful voice for working people and America's great middle class."

title: After Sheikh Hasina's Ouster, Bangladeshis Dream Of Better Future
content: One day after the military took control of Bangladesh following the ouster of the prime minister, the parliament in the capital Dhaka was busy with protesters coming to celebrate.
summary: One day after the military took control of Bangladesh following the ouster of the prime minister, the parliament in the capital Dhaka was busy with protesters coming to celebrate.

title: Ultra-Orthodox Anti-draft Protesters Break Into Israeli Army Base
content: Dozens of ultra-Orthodox Jews protesting against compulsory military service for their community broke into an army base near Tel Aviv on Tuesday, the military said in a statement.
summary: Dozens of ultra-Orthodox Jews protesting against compulsory military service for their community broke into an army base near Tel Aviv on Tuesday, the military said in a statement.

title: Tim Walz Says "Honor Of A Lifetime" To Be Kamala Harris's Veep Pick
content: "I'm all in. It reminds me a bit of the first day of school. So, let's get this done, folks!" Walz said on X.
summary: "I'm all in. It reminds me a bit of the first day of school. So, let's get this done, folks!" Walz said on X.

title: Panic In Beirut As Israeli Warplanes Break Sound Barrier Thrice
content: Israeli warplanes swooped low over the Lebanese capital Beirut on Tuesday, setting off a series of sonic booms that rattled windows across the city minutes before the head of Lebanon's Hezbollah was set to give an address.
summary: Israeli warplanes swooped low over the Lebanese capital Beirut on Tuesday, setting off a series of sonic booms that rattled windows across the city minutes before the head of Lebanon's Hezbollah was set to give an address.

title: 6,000 Specialist Police Ready To Deal With UK Far-Right Riots: Government
content: The UK government said on Tuesday that 6,000 specialist police were ready to deal with far-right rioting after another night of destructive troubles in English cities.
summary: The UK government said on Tuesday that 6,000 specialist police were ready to deal with far-right rioting after another night of destructive troubles in English cities.

title: Nobel Winner Yunus Says Ready To Head Interim Government In Bangladesh
content: Nobel winner Muhammad Yunus said on Tuesday he was ready to head an interim government in Bangladesh after mass demonstrations forced longtime ruler Sheikh Hasina to flee the country.
summary: Nobel winner Muhammad Yunus said on Tuesday he was ready to head an interim government in Bangladesh after mass demonstrations forced longtime ruler Sheikh Hasina to flee the country.

title: 5 Points On Tim Walz, Kamala Harris' Veep Pick Who Calls Trump "Weird"
content: Making one of the most consequential decisions of her campaign, the US Democratic presidential nominee Kamala Harris has picked Minnesota Governor Tim Walz as her running mate, reports have said.
summary: Making one of the most consequential decisions of her campaign, the US Democratic presidential nominee Kamala Harris has picked Minnesota Governor Tim Walz as her running mate, reports have said.

title: UK Riots: Elon Musk Hits Back At Keir Starmer With 'Family Guy' Meme
content: In his recent tweet, Musk, the billionaire owner of X, slammed the UK government again with a 'Family Guy' meme.
summary: In his recent tweet, Musk, the billionaire owner of X, slammed the UK government again with a 'Family Guy' meme.

title: US Man Tied Girlfriend To Signpost In Nevada Desert Before Watching Her Die
content: A US man, who convinced his girlfriend to drive to a desert, where he then tied her to a post and watched her die, has been sentenced to life in prison.
summary: A US man, who convinced his girlfriend to drive to a desert, where he then tied her to a post and watched her die, has been sentenced to life in prison.

title: 5 Key Points On Mohammed Shahabuddin, President Of Bangladesh
content: On Tuesday, Shahabuddin dissolved parliament and paved the way for the formation of an interim government and new elections, with army chief General Waker-Uz-Zaman scheduled to meet student leaders to discuss further steps.
summary: On Tuesday, Shahabuddin dissolved parliament and paved the way for the formation of an interim government and new elections, with army chief General Waker-Uz-Zaman scheduled to meet student leaders to discuss further steps.

title: Muhammad Yunus: Bangladesh's 'Banker To The Poor'
content: Nobel-winning microfinance pioneer Muhammad Yunus has been asked by Bangladeshi protest leaders to helm an interim government to replace ousted premier Sheikh Hasina, who had hounded him in speeches and through the courts.
summary: Nobel-winning microfinance pioneer Muhammad Yunus has been asked by Bangladeshi protest leaders to helm an interim government to replace ousted premier Sheikh Hasina, who had hounded him in speeches and through the courts.

title: Minnesota Governor Tim Walz Is Kamala Harris' Running Mate
content: Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris selected Minnesota Governor Tim Walz to be her running mate on Tuesday, choosing a progressive policy champion and a plain speaker from America's heartland to help win over rural, white voters, said peo

title: Amazon India Head Manish Tiwary Resigns
content: Amazon.com India's country head Manish Tiwary has resigned after an eight-year stint and will leave the e-commerce giant in October, the company said on Tuesday.
summary: Amazon.com India's country head Manish Tiwary has resigned after an eight-year stint and will leave the e-commerce giant in October, the company said on Tuesday.
